Summary: 4am saw a 'chevron-shaped object in the sky
divs: sighting detailsno noise emitted from object; silent & 'floating' across the sky.i was in the air force @ the time & had to be @ kirtland afb early that morning. it was in the early am hours that i views the ufo! i was interrupted @ work! i want to be a case manager w\ mufon!! how do i go about this? i am a rn case manager presently
